extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not supported by Plex
Este add-on no está respaldado por Plex
Dieses Addon wird nicht von der Firma Plex Inc. unterstützt
extension.news: - SeekDialog: When showing stream info, pressing RIGHT will show playerprocessinfo, pressing LEFT will show playerdebug - Core: Check plex.direct dns rebind issues more thoroughly and don't completely rely on the protection flags from the Plex server registry (often false); can lead to a slightly longer bootup time - Home: Always remove "Loading external hubs" property indicator; it was possible to get this message stuck when moving away too quickly from the watchlist section - Library/listview-16x9: Reimplement item type filter - Playlist: Fix playlist subsequent chunking (was broken) (thanks @BrendanMyers88) - Playlist: Select the currently relevant item once it's been created properly - Playlist: Clear persistent cache when reloading playlist items after returning from watching - Playlist: Massively improve resource usage on big video playlists when returning from playback by only refreshing affected items - Episodes: Explicitly clear persistent cache on progress - Home: Only trigger a forced hub refresh on screensaver wake if we're the active window - Playlist: Correctly show and scale video progress - Movies: Show duration for extras - Player: Don't skip to next episode after final credits marker was skipped if binge mode or skip postplay for TV isn't active (thanks @Tyri0n) - Episodes: When returning from playback, explicitly mark items watched on the Plex API (sometimes Plex doesn't consider items watched if the actual playback time was too short; e.g.: skipped to final credits marker immediately) - Player/SeekDialog: Allow for immediate skipping of a counting down marker (before you had to wait 1 second for that to work) (needs the respective AddonSetting enabled as well) - Player: Never show postplay for movie extras, regardless of any postplay setting
